text: so I spent a lot of time talking to
customers and talking to the executive
level within organizations around
cultural implications of cloud how cloud
adoption impacts the culture of the
organization and how the culture of the
organization impacts cloud adoption and
one of the things that's really
important to and can't be overstated I
think is that you don't want to boil the
ocean it's not necessary or even or even
practical to try and overhaul your
entire organizational culture it's been
in place oftentimes for many many years
there's power in that culture there's
been success that's been achieved
through the culture of the organization
and so it's really important to
understand sort of you know what is that
relationship between Cod adoption and
the culture of the organization can you
tap into and really have that look in
the mirror moment to understand what is
that what is our true identity what you
know what are those implicit attitudes
and behaviors that exist within the
organization that are both positive and
can help accelerate that cloud adoption
journey as well as some of those
attitudes and behaviors that perhaps can
detract away from that adoption journey
and understanding what those are
understanding what that looks like
figuring out how you can tap into that
positive side and really use and
leverage those things to help accelerate
your journey is incredibly important
you
[Music]
